item.title: Social Media Video Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to create engaging social media video content for the launch of our limited edition 3D printed light fixtures. The videos should showcase the uniqueness and beauty of our products while effectively communicating their features and benefits. The content should be visually stunning, attention-grabbing, and optimized for various social media platforms.

    Responsibilities:
    - Conceptualize and storyboard video ideas
    - Shoot and edit high-quality videos
    - Add relevant captions, text overlays, and graphics
    - Optimize videos for social media platforms
    - Collaborate with our marketing team to ensure brand consistency

    Skills:
    - Video editing software proficiency (e.g. Adobe Premiere Pro)
    - Creative storytelling and visual communication
    - Knowledge of social media platforms and best practices
    - Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

    This is a medium-sized project with an estimated duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level video content creator who can bring our vision to life and make our limited edition launch a memorable success.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 15:52 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Production, Social Media Management, Facebook
Skills: Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Production, Social Media Management, Facebook
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
